website_summaries.verdict: The Epson 5030UB projector is better then ever, with excellent picture quality for the money and class-leading light output, making it shine in both dark and moderately lit rooms.
pros: The Epson PowerLite Home Cinema 5030UB projector can deliver great dark-room images yet has enough light output for moderately lit rooms
achieves darker blacks than last year's version
plenty of features including motorized lens cover, horizontal and vertical lens shift, and two pairs of 3D glasses
cons: Black levels not quite as deep as somewhat more expensive D-ILA competitors
auto iris required for peak performance

customer_reviews.title: It completely quit after 3 years of infrequent use.
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely happy with this projector up to the point it quit working. It takes about 7 minutes for the EPSON logo to appear now and then it can't find any signal from the HDMI. The menu etc. became extremely slow to respond and there is no picture whatsoever. People with similar issues on the A/V forums are saying that it's $700-$1000 to have this issue fixed. No thanks.. I had also purchased a very expensive standby replacement bulb that is now useless. If someone is happy with a 3 year product, go for it. Otherwise, find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Ft Worth, Texas

customer_reviews.title: the dark scenes are really really great and the whole picture seems to pop
customer_reviews.text: Only have had a couple weeks and wow, wow, what a difference from the ole Sanyo PLV5 , 1100 lumens (which served me well from 2009), the dark scenes are really really great and the whole picture seems to pop. The lens shift works great and I appreciate that that there is an automatic lens cover that closes when the unit is turned off. I can almost watch with the shades up, but that much better in the controlled light man cave. Ambient light seems fine. Have not tried the 3D yet, but the included 3D glasses seem well made. Have it running with my harmony one remote flawlessly. Would recommend this hands down just based on my 2-week experience.
customer_reviews.author: K. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Don't listen to people who tell you just to get a big tv
customer_reviews.text: Awesome picture! You can't buy a tv that is anywhere close to the size this projects. Ambiant light doesn't knock out the picture. You don't need a total blackout to enjoy it like the old projectors needed. Don't bother getting an expensive screen or special paint. We used it on our living room wall while finishing our theater room. The wall is builders grade beige and the only effect that had on the picture was an added warmth compared to the same picture on our tv. We aren't big gamers but didn't notice any lag when using our PS4. Never going to the theater again to watch a movie.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Ezzell

customer_reviews.title: bad hdmi ports
customer_reviews.text: The picture is great on this projector, however... Shortly after I bought it, it stopped working due to defective HDMI input port, Espson swapped me out a "refurbished" unit which was also defective, the 2nd "refurbished" unit they sent me worked for a little while but then failed a year later. The warranty only covers for 2 years so I had to buy a new projector after that. After researching it, I learned that these failing HDMI ports are a common problem for this model.
customer_reviews.author: murjim

customer_reviews.title: Best 3D projector for the price
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a projector I've had for about 6 years so doubling to 2400 lumens has been fantastic. The clarity is awesome and the blacks are fantastic. I won't go in to details but if you are interested in getting a 3D projector, especially as prices go down with 4K projectors, this is a great projector for the price and some will argue it is the best... me being one of them.
customer_reviews.author: tengleha

customer_reviews.title: Great projector!
customer_reviews.text: Holy cow! What a great projector this is. The first movie we watched was in 3D and it was awesome! Even with some ambient light this projector was bright and with 3D glasses on too. I purchased some extra Samsung 3D glasses to use with it and they work as good as the included glasses (OK, maybe even better if you wear glasses like I do! I wore the Samsung because they fit over glasses better and the view was the same.) This is my first projector to own and setup was easy. I chose a 120" screen and the projector is 16' away and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ruskoski

customer_reviews.title: I definately recommend this projector it's awesome and the picture quality is ...
customer_reviews.text: My first projector was really expensive home theater projector. It was still going strong but I felt the need to upgrade to new technology and took the plunge in getting this projector without seeing the picture quality and based in reviews alone. I have a dedicated home theater with controlled lighting. I definately recommend this projector it's awesome and the picture quality is amazing. As far as 3D I haven't used it for 3D yet but for me 3D is a gimmick anyways so I don't care for it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiber Box

customer_reviews.title: Problem of starting
customer_reviews.text: I bought this projector last August. It works fine for the first 3 months, then it start to having problems of starting, probable one out of three times when it starts the fan will start going really fast and loud, like it’s over heated but it’s not, after about 5 minutes then it starts or it would just not start at all, I have to unplug it and replug in to make it start. I've searched online and fund people have similar issue with this projector. But nobody can find a solution for this. Very disappointed with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Haihong Zhou

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Still great over 2 years later. Use it for TV and movies at least 5 times a week. Sometimes I use it for gaming, and then I have to turn off the "fine" setting because it adds too much delay. But that setting is great for movies and TV. Frame interpolation is gr at most of the time too.
customer_reviews.author: Zerlogg

customer_reviews.title: high-end, and gives mind blowing performance
customer_reviews.text: Mind blowing performance. I had to go for this one because of my room size and the placement of the projector. I tried a few lower end projectors, but their throw was too short and lens shift would not be as wide or not even available. This one has a very large throw ratio and both horizontal and vertical lens shift. The location for me is one corner of my 120" screen and 20feet away, and this one barely made it to my screen, but I am glad it did. Colors and brightness are mind blowing. 3d is also awesome. Too bad, not too much content out there yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. SK

customer_reviews.title: Very good picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good picture quality. Colors are vibrant and stunning. Nice bright picture for a projector. THX mode for movies is perfect right out of the box. Adjustments make it simple to perfectly match the projectors image to the screen. My only complaint is that this thing is huge and heavy. My peerless mount was a must for this projector.
customer_reviews.author: Brew Time

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Projector!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing projector! How many 5/5 star products are you ever going to find from such a large number of reviewers? At this price you're crazy not to upgrade like we did having a much older projector. We can get years of use out of this projector while waiting for the dust to settle on 4K units and it's already like watching our favorite movies all over again. Superb product!! One on line review rated this their #1 choice out of 10 top 4K picks for 2015 as a non-4K projector - I'd say that speaks volumes to how great it is.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: This project is simply amazing. Picture quality is better than any movie theater ...
customer_reviews.text: This project is simply amazing. Picture quality is better than any movie theater (especially 3D). I've used the following guide to paint the projector screen of 150", and couldnt be more happier with my purchase: $100.htm
customer_reviews.author: Iosif Yeremuk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Projector for the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Projector for the money. Picture is very sharp and color is pretty accurate right out of the box in the THX mode. I did a little tweaking but wasn't much so very impressed with this unit out of the box. The contrast ratio on this projector is amazing. Blacks are inkey which really is big on a projector. The RF 3d glasses work much better then the infrared ones on the 5010 I had before. Only downside is this doesn't handle 4k but at least it isn't fake 4k either. Well worth the money if you want to get large screen experience at home.
customer_reviews.author: John S

customer_reviews.title: Great projector that lasted until warranty ended :)
customer_reviews.text: Good projector for the period that it worked. Did extensive research and this looked like the product to get back in 2016. The hdmi ports stopped working conveniently 6 months after warranty ended. I live in Singapore now and the beautiful mess that is Epson refuses to fix the unit (even if I'm willing to pay). So all in all, like a 4-5 stars for 2 years, dropping to zero once it stops working and you've to deal with Epson lol. Probably stick w Canon.
customer_reviews.author: Varun Varma

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this projector for two weeks and am very impressed. Admittedly it's my first projector but I did a lot of research before choosing it. My basement home theater setup is fairly dark so that helps but even with some ambient light it has a bright picture and great contrast. Easy to setup and a very quiet motor in the Eco mode, which is how I run it. My screen is a Draper 120" 1.3 gain and the projector is mounted on the ceiling 14 ft away. No complaints thus far.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B

customer_reviews.title: Beats the competition, well worth the money. Totally Satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: This replaced my old hitachi cpx400. It is amazing. I compared it to the Panasonic PTAE8000U side by side and found that it looked brighter in general. Good price for a projector, and it is fun to use 3D. Lens shift works great since the projector is ceiling mounted. I like that the air vents are in the front since it sits in a little cubby hole. No real complaints on this bad boy. Well worth the money, and I did my research.
customer_reviews.author: Amir

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Projector.
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a Sony VZ projector. This has significantly more light. Can see the screen even with ambient sunlight in the room. Excellent colors and contrast. Didn't really care about 3D, but just for fun bought a SD BluRay DVD player . . . . . that was the beginning of a very expensive project. To actually get 3D needed to replace a 2 year old receiver as well as all the HDMI Cables.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Miller

customer_reviews.title: A SIX STAR PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.text: STOP LOOKING AT THE CHEAP STUFF. JUST BUY THIS ONE. YOU WILL BE HAPPY. THE CONTRAST IS FANTASTIC.. THE PICTURE QUALITY IS FANTASTIC.. BUT I DO HAVE FULL CONTROL OF ANY OUTSIDE LIGHTING... IT LOOKS BETTER THAN ANY "TV" I HAVE EVERY HAD.. JUST LIKE BEING AT THE MOVIES.. EXCEPT I AM NOT SITTING IN OTHER PEOPLES STINCH. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Margo Pigg

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: 1000% happy. purchase for color and tilt shift lens. Both did not disappoint. to say the picture is awesome is an understatement. zero need for 4K. what is point. from here I sit cannot see pixels anyway. VERY VERY HAPPY!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: HoldenRider

customer_reviews.title: A great buy for your buck!!
customer_reviews.text: This projector is amazing, 2D to 3D conversion works just like the theater projector. The 3D glasses are theater quality aswell. Color saturation is impeccable even with light coming in through windows and very easy to set up. I've already recommended this product to many friends and if your looking to buy I fully recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adam wade

customer_reviews.title: great projector, had it a little over a year ...
customer_reviews.text: great projector, had it a little over a year before I ran into a problem with it shutting itself down every min or so, called Epson support and they shipped me a new one free of charge, best customer service I have ever ran into, called the number twice and both times got a rep right away without waiting. great company highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mike G

customer_reviews.title: Exclent Product
customer_reviews.text: This Projector is simply amazing, the picture quality is out of this world!!!!! Great product, you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sr.

customer_reviews.title: ... projectors if you are worried if this is a good one. I spent allot of time researching before ...
customer_reviews.text: Go out and read proper reviews of projectors if you are worried if this is a good one. I spent allot of time researching before coming to the conclusion that this projector is amazing. Now after having owned it for a few months I can say that it is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This home projector works very well with the movies that we watch no matter the years it was made in, it brings it to a great picture and it still works and in great condition. Great product for movies..
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Both work perfectly and throw a beautiful picture. One projector at 20 feet and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two Epson projectors. One from 5 years ago and this one. Both work perfectly and throw a beautiful picture. One projector at 20 feet and the other at 17 feet. Both work flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Dutch

customer_reviews.title: Amazing projector
customer_reviews.text: Not 4k. But nothing short of great Works amazing. Picture is amazing and crisp...have it on ceiling in movie room Very nice and well.made Amazon price was very good. Shipped safe and very quickly
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: If your source material is good (e. g
customer_reviews.text: Incredible image quality. If your source material is good (e.g. Blu-Ray), the image is crisp, bright, with rich colors. At a distance of about 12' from the projection surface, you get a picture that's about 110". Go further back, and it gets HUGE.
customer_reviews.author: OrlandoResident

customer_reviews.title: For the price, i'm not sure it get's any better
customer_reviews.text: Love this projector. Have it ceiling mounted with a Peerless mount and couldn't be happier. Using it with a 135" silver ticket wall mounted grey screen.
customer_reviews.author: gmsuperfan

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic projector. 3D is theater as good as the theater. It is very quiet. I think it was worth the price. Be sure to look for a promo on Epson's site to get a free lamp with purchase. Loved watching the Super Bowl on this.
customer_reviews.author: A. Andrew

customer_reviews.title: great. however sometimes it would fail to warm up ...
customer_reviews.text: great. however sometimes it would fail to warm up properly and close itself off again. you just have to be patient with it and start it again. the second time around it will wake up.
customer_reviews.author: Tofu Minx

customer_reviews.title: An amazing Projector
customer_reviews.text: An amazing Projector. Very flexible in terms of lens shifting and distance. Very happy with it. My only comment would be the noise the automatic dunamic shutter makes while moving from dark scenes to bright ones. the visual effect is great, but it's a little noisy in a quiet enviorment
customer_reviews.author: Eyal R.

customer_reviews.title: This projector works great and provided perfect picture in both day and night
customer_reviews.text: If u are going to build a home theater, don't get cheap with your projector. This projector works great and provided perfect picture in both day and night
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Wow, amazing picture.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. I was boasting to my beautiful bride about how bright the picture was and then found out I was in the THX mode, which isn't even the brightest mode. I can watch movies with the blinds open. 3D content plays great. My only complaint is that the glasses are so expensive. I still give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: S. B. H.

customer_reviews.title: My 5030UB shuts off randomly, $2k projector - do not buy- called tech support, no help?
customer_reviews.text: My 5030UB shuts off randomly, $2k projector - do not buy- called tech support, no help?
customer_reviews.author: Paul-PHX

customer_reviews.title: Amazing projector. When you put in the time and ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing projector. When you put in the time and effort to find and install a projector screen, setup surround sound speakers, and darken the room, it's like you're at the movie theaters. A projector is a good deal more work than a TV, but it is completely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Best projector for the price
customer_reviews.text: After almost a year of use I can honestly say I can highly recommend this to anybody who is looking to get into the next level of movie watching at home.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Great for games and movies!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for Xbox one, it is very clear and bright. It also has fine image sharpening, that clears up old movies well. It also has frame interpolation that adds HD grams inbetween regular frames to smooth fast motion(but this cause a little lag on games) makes movies look great though!!! Better than my old Sony Bravia!!
customer_reviews.author: Casey C. Harding

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent projector. It has many options to tweak the picture. It's easy to set up and is very clear and powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great projector.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this projector in November 2015 and after over 3200 hours of use it's still running strong. It's easy to use and the 2D to 3D conversion is great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Calusine

customer_reviews.title: I have used Epson Home Cinema for 2 years. ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used Epson Home Cinema for 2 years. I was worried about angle because the ceiling in my basement is not standard. However, I noticed that I can adjust the angle at whatever I want.
customer_reviews.author: HousePro

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Much better quality than I was expecting. Awesome picture and very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wright

customer_reviews.title: This product is already a classic. There is a ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is already a classic. There is a reason why these units are still going for $2k even after its release since 2013.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry and Zakk

customer_reviews.title: ... for movies and games on my wall and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I use this projector for movies and games on my wall and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Liu

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended home theatre viewing
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to form part of a 7.2 home theatre system along with a 3m screen, Pioneer SC-LX88 AVR, Oppo BDP-95 Blu-Ray and Monitor Audio Apex audio. Very simple to install and set up and delivers images of the highest quality. Use this very good link to check that the projector will work in your viewing room:
customer_reviews.author: Grzz

customer_reviews.title: A very very good projector. Vibrant color contrast without any calibration
customer_reviews.text: A very very good projector. Vibrant color contrast without any calibration. From 13.5 ft away on to a 120" screen. Job well done by Epson. My only issue was with the missing horizontal keystone.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality. I have it mounted at an extended distance which it is capable of (24 ft) and it still has great picture quality and brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Bower

customer_reviews.title: Product was great for two years
customer_reviews.text: Product was great for two years, but now overheating and needs to be repaired. Shockingly, Epson's warranty only lasts two years. Be prepared to spend more a couple years down the line.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Armer

customer_reviews.title: Superb picture quality. A little loud and warm.
customer_reviews.text: Love this projector. A little loud and seems to generate some heat (heats up the movie room over the course of a movie). But the picture quality has been superb!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Haggard

customer_reviews.title: amazing projector .
customer_reviews.text: bought it for my Man cave works amazingly with wide amazing color depth and features.worth 2k for a mid range man cave .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best projected for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, it went on sale and I got the seller to honor the sale price as I bought it 5 days before the sale. Great quality from great people! :D
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Brunetta

customer_reviews.title: life changing
customer_reviews.text: i'm sure there is newer better stuff out there but i'd be hard pressed to tell the difference between this and some newer stuff. luckily i don't watch 4k next to this so this works for me.
customer_reviews.author: 대니

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I have this projecting on a 165 inch screen. Until 4K becomes affordable. THIS IS IT!! From easy set up to watching wonderful HDTV in 5 minutes flat. Excellent value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Photon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a home theater
customer_reviews.text: Using it for my home theater and so far has been awesome! I wished it supported 4k but for the price, I think one of the best in the class.
customer_reviews.author: Sanket Shah

customer_reviews.title: phenomenal picture
customer_reviews.text: Phenomenal picture and brightness. My viewing room has no windows and canned lighting controls so that the first 2/3 of the room near screen is off. There is some ambient light from the entry into the room but it still looks phenomenal. I recommend using the dynamic color setting for best range of colors to be near LCD flatscreen color brightness.
customer_reviews.author: Disappointed

customer_reviews.title: ... was an upgrade from our old projector and we love it! Great color and HD enhancement
customer_reviews.text: This was an upgrade from our old projector and we love it! Great color and HD enhancement!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great projector, you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Great projector, unbelievable picture displayed on the big screen. There customer service and warranty are second to none. You can buy with confidence knowing that you are buying a great product from a company that stands behind its products.
customer_reviews.author: Bloecherk

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had an optoma hd 25lv before this and even when the optoma has more lumens the epson its more brighter and the picture quality its amazing. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: End your search. This is the projector!!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding picture quality. Easy setup. I watch a lot of movies and shows and play Xbox frequently. This projector handles it all.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best 3d and the best 2d home theater love the t,h,x 5 of 5 love it
customer_reviews.author: perry

customer_reviews.title: it's not a bother (and not bad unless you're sitting right in front of it
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding! Git yourself one. You deserve it don't you? Only con is that it's a bit noisy with 3D due to the increased brightness but since I'll be using 3D rarely, it's not a bother (and not bad unless you're sitting right in front of it.) Last projector was a Homelite 10+ which lasted 13 years (on the same bulb no less) which is still going. It's also rather large.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Epson 5030UB
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. I haven't tried 3d yet though. 2D is very good out of the box. So good that I didn't bother with running a calibration bluray for a couple weeks. When I did I hardly changed the default settings.
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: Love(d) this projector (until it broke)
customer_reviews.text: Update: 2 years and 3 months after purchase I get the dreaded "No Signal" on my HDMI inputs. Insane so many of us have this problem and Epson's answer is: "Pay someone $1000 to fix it for you." Previous 5 Star Review: Paired this with a 120" silver ticket screen. It's amazing! My only complaint is that for the best image it requires a very dark room. The image looks pretty washed out in normal light conditions. At night or with all of the blinds closed and the lights off, however, it is unbelievable. I'm pretty sure there is no reason to pay to go to the theater again.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K

customer_reviews.title: Works excellent. Gets loud when switching to 3D or to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent. Gets loud when switching to 3D or to natural lighting. Quality is decent, not like on the 4K TV but good enough :))
customer_reviews.author: Karina R.

customer_reviews.title: This projector let me do that pretty easily with only 10 feet of throw distance
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have much projector distance but I really wanted to use all of my 120 inch screen. This projector let me do that pretty easily with only 10 feet of throw distance. Haven't played with it much yet but so far from the initial setup the picture quality is amazing. Nice buy.
customer_reviews.author: harshavardhan mudimela

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Projector. Bought this for $2200 and have it ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Projector. Bought this for $2200 and have it paired with the SilverTicket 135" cinewhite 1.1 gain screen ($340). So about $2500 for a 135" awesome theatre video. I have documented my DIY Home Theatre build. Here is a video of the screen mounted.  Here is a video of the Epson 5030 shooting a film on the SilverTicket Screen  Here is a video of the Epson 5030 SilverTicket vs Sony 55" led (55HX729)
customer_reviews.author: Mark L

customer_reviews.title: Very very pleased with machine
customer_reviews.text: Very very pleased with machine. Simple to install and the picture is incredible. I have a dedicated home theater and this projector provides more than enough in terms of features and display
customer_reviews.author: Slava

customer_reviews.title: xbox and computer very satisfied, excellent picture
customer_reviews.text: I have had this since December 2015,had it hooked up to roku,satellite ,xbox and computer very satisfied, excellent picture,would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: amazon lover

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievable crisp picture, super clear image, and very bright, Can even watch with lights on using the "living room" setting
customer_reviews.author: CClarke

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I paired the Epson with a Oppo Blu-Ray player and get an incredible picture. The projector arrived as promised.
customer_reviews.author: R Matthews

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PROJECTOR!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best purchases I've ever made. I highly recommend this projector. The 3D quality blows me away every time I watch a 3D movie. The only drawback is the fan is louder than I typically would want it however in cinema mode its not noticeable. Other than that I don't have anything negative to say about this projector.
customer_reviews.author: dan l

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic machine! WHo needs a TV
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic machine! WHo needs a TV. Best purchase I've made in a long time. Friends come over and are blown away
customer_reviews.author: XXX

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install yourself. Works perfectly for my theater room.

customer_reviews.title: I love to watch blurays on it
customer_reviews.text: The proyector is the s***. I love to watch blurays on it. I was a bit impressed by actually how big it is. Its really a massive unit. But I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Evans

customer_reviews.title: You will not regret it!
customer_reviews.text: If you're in the market for a good quality projector that can truly deliver HD quality image, get this product. You will not regret it. My friends are all impressed at how great this thing can project movies.
customer_reviews.author: San M. Tejada

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this projector! by far blows out my last projector that I payed 8k for! I would recommend this projector to anyone who wants a kickass theater room! The colors are so vibrant and crisp!! no problem setting up at all. and the 3D is amazing!!

customer_reviews.title: just amazing. We were all shocked with the excellent picture
customer_reviews.text: just amazing. We were all shocked with the excellent picture.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great projector! My husband (who is very picky) loves it. Wonderful resolution. Picture is fabulous. Couldn't be happier. It's great
customer_reviews.author: Customer from MN

customer_reviews.title: :-) :-) A M A Z I N G!! :-) :-)
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Projector!! Crystal Clear!! 3D is awesome! Such an improvement over our last projector! Most definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Joanette N.

customer_reviews.title: no signal
customer_reviews.text: no signal.. ridiculous that much money for less then 100 hrs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great picture
customer_reviews.text: Superb picture, quiet, easy menu settings to optimize the picture with separate adjustment for black level, white level, color temp and saturation. Have it on a 120" screen and the hd is incredible. 3d works great too. Bought some additional glasses by Quantum 3d and they are cheaper than epson and also more comfortable. If you have a light controlled media room buy this projector
customer_reviews.author: ian murray

customer_reviews.title: Best picture quality I've seen on a projector
customer_reviews.text: Best picture quality I've seen on a projector ,you can compare this to an LCD TV.. This will not disappoint !!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Slider

customer_reviews.title: Best projector I could afford and I love it
customer_reviews.text: I waited patiently to buy this projector and it was 100% worth it everything I read about the projector was true I absolutely love my theater room thanks to my awesome projector
customer_reviews.author: witzer sylla

customer_reviews.title: ... didn't I buy this year's ago instead of a boring and bulky television
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I buy this year's ago instead of a boring and bulky television? Completely in love and will never go without a projector again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic projector, easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic projector, easy to set up, great quality picture. My family and friends who have seen it want one, that pretty much says it all.
customer_reviews.author: No Butt

customer_reviews.title: Impressed me
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Nice clear and BRIGHT 2D picture. 3D impressed me as well. A tad noisy but set to Eco and turn off the auto iris, like it's not even there. But I've only owned for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Scruff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it major upgrade from a mitsubishi hc5000 best upgrade to theater room
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Awesome projector great color great picture on a 120" high contrast gray screen. I would recommend this projector to any one. It is pricey but worth every penny. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I am very glad I went with this projector. My friend has the same one. After watching it on his 120" screen, I knew it would look great on my 106", and it does.
customer_reviews.author: Brent G.

customer_reviews.title: unless you are going lazor or a Sony high end product this have the best image.
customer_reviews.text: My third Epson, unless you are going lazor or a Sony high end product this have the best image.
customer_reviews.author: Greg S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great picture quality. Would like powered zoom and focus. But picture quality compensates for that.
customer_reviews.author: Pridhvi

customer_reviews.title: ... just put it up and the image quality was great. You do get the bang for the bucks
customer_reviews.text: I just put it up and the image quality was great. You do get the bang for the bucks.
customer_reviews.author: DP

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good interface
customer_reviews.text: Well it's first projector I've owned. Pretty good interface, focus adjustments, throw distance and great picture so far no issues I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Great projector!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture. Lens shift made it extremely simple to install. Worked well with peerless ceiling mount.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Fee

customer_reviews.title: 2 projectors gone bad in just over 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in February 2014. The first one was defective out of the box. Epson sent me a replacement refurbished unit which worked well until the warranty expired, the hdmi inputs failed and will no longer accept a signal. 2 projectors gone bad in just over 2 years. Projector itself has a nice picture and worked well in my theater. Definitely has some quality issues. I would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bob R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great projector! Very easy to set up and has a awesome picture! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jarett Berg

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Faultless. Great PQ. Plug and play Oceania region (supplied my own 240v, 3 pin plug) in lieu of the locally available tw9200. Paired with the Peerless mount. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great projector. Projecting 100" and crisp
customer_reviews.text: Great projector. Projecting 100" and crisp, clear images. Good black levels and no motion artifacts.
customer_reviews.author: Drdk

customer_reviews.title: Great Black Levels
customer_reviews.text: Have to step up to the Epson UB models for great black levels, and this matches my expectations. Plenty bright for my needs as well
customer_reviews.author: Brent Matthew Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased with Peerless PRG-UNV-W mount, and STR-169110 Silver Ticket 110" Diagonal 16:9 4K Ultra HD Ready HDTV screen. Image is phenomenal, some motion artifact in panning scenes but no worse than a very good LCD. Image is bright, and still watchable in my moderately lit room. I installed about 12 ft from the wall and display 110". If I pull the curtain, it is just amazing. I didn't buy it for 3D but after watching a couple of movies I am looking for more. I already purchased 4 more pairs of glasses (comes with 2 very nice pairs). Everyone that has seen it is impressed. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: B

product_meta.title: Epson Home Cinema 5030UB 1080p 3D 3LCD Home Theater Projector (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Style:Previous Model - 2400 Lumens

Home Cinema Projectors 2D and 3D high–definition dedicated home
theater projector with THX certification
and Ultra Black levels. 
Bring the movie theater experience home with the Home Cinema 5030UB. Experience incredible cinematic adventures with 2D and 3D, Full HD 1080p performance. Movies, sporting events and video games virtually jump off the screen with 2400 lumens of color brightness and 2400 lumens of white brightness.1 Get deep black levels with a contrast ratio up to 600,000:1. Horizontal and vertical lens shift and a 2.1x zoom ratio ensure setup flexibility in difficult installation environments. And, THX display certification, the performance benchmark recognized by consumers and professionals, ensures natural textures, and a film–like movie experience. Plus, two pairs of RF 3D glasses are included, so you're always ready for exciting 3D experiences. Key Features Up to 3x Brighter Colors with Epson2 

Brilliant image quality requires high color brightness. Epson 3LCD projectors have up to 3x Brighter Colors than leading competitive projectors.2

Bright and Colorful 

Amazing color brightness in almost any lighting.

Rich, vibrant color and reliable performance 

3LCD, 3–chip technology 
and C2Fine technology.

HDMI Connectivity

Two HDMI ports make it easy to connect to receivers, Blu–ray®players, game consoles, Apple®iPad®, Apple TV and more. 

THX display certification 

Ensures accurate picture quality, adhering to performance standards for black levels, resolution, contrast, color gamut and signal processing.

Exquisite detail 

An incredible contrast ratio up
to 600,000:1

Easy, stress-free setup 

Get a perfectly aligned image in
seconds with versatile image
correction tools. 

Images up to 300" 

Larger–than–life entertainment in your own home. 

Rechargeable
RF 3D glasses 

Enjoy 3D adventures from any seat in the house. 



Product Description & Features

• One measurement of brightness is not enough — look for both high color brightness and high white brightness

The PowerLite Home Cinema 5030UB has:
Color Brightness: 2400 lumens1
White Brightness: 2400 lumens1

• Exquisite detail — up to 600,000:1 contrast ratio, plus Super–resolution technology

• Stunning picture uniformity and color — features a state–of–the–art Fujinon® lens and built–in cinema filter 

• Built–in color modes — choose from one of four special color modes optimized for different content and settings.

• Outstanding support — two–year limited warranty and toll-free support

WHAT'S IN THE BOX
 * PowerLite Home Cinema 5030UB projector
 * Power cord
 * Two HDMI cable clamps
 * Remote control with AA batteries
 * CD-ROM with users guide link
 * Two pairs of RF 3D glasses
 * 3D glasses charging cable
 * Quick Setup Guide

White Brightness: 2400 Lumens; Color Brightness: 2400 Lumens
Contrast Ratio: 600,000:1; Keystone Correction: Yes; Lens Shift: Yes
Warranty: 2 Year Limited; Lamp Life: Up to 5,000 hours (ECO mode) and up to 4000 hours (Normal mode)
Connectivity: 2 x HDMI, 1 RS-232c, 1 RCA (composite), 3 RCA (component), 1 VGA D-sub 15 pin (computer input)
